questions.question: What is the purpose of the Noisy Latent Image node in ComfyUI_Noise?
questions.answer: Generates noise which can be used to influence image generations.

questions.question: How many settings does the Duplicate Batch Index node have?
What does the Slerp Latents node do?
questions.answer: Mixes two latents together, creating a weighted average of their values.

questions.question: How can I calculate the amount of noise a sampler expects?
questions.answer: Use the Get Sigma node to calculate the sigma based on the model and sampler configuration.

questions.question: Which node can inject noise into an image latent?
questions.answer: The Inject Noise node is used to inject the generated noise into the image latent.

questions.question: What is the function of the Unsampler node?
questions.answer: Calculates the noise required to generate a given image from a model and a prompt.

questions.question: Give an example of using the nodes to generate variations from a given seed.
questions.answer: The provided workflow demonstrates using nodes to generate small variations of an image based on a given seed.

questions.question: How can I access the noise used to recreate a specific image?
questions.answer: The workflow provides an example of using the Unsampler node to generate the noise that recreates a given image.
